name: Gnome Trickster
text: Your arcane talents go beyond the illusory.
prerequisites: Cha 13, gnome, gnome magic racial trait.
benefit: In addition to your normal gnome spell-like abilities, you also gain the following spell-like abilities: 1/day—mage hand and prestidigitation.
mythicText: Thanks to your mythic power, the magic in your blood has grown more potent and diverse.
mythicBenefit:
You gain the following spell-like abilities: 1/day—blur and vanish.

You can use your gnome spell-like abilities an additional number of times per day equal to half your tier. You can spend these additional uses to use any of your gnome spell-like abilities you wish. Your caster level for your gnome spell-like abilities becomes your character level plus your tier.
text_zh: 你的奥术天赋不光体现在幻术方面上。
prerequisites_zh: 魅力13，侏儒，【侏儒魔法】种族特性。
benefit_zh: 除了你的正常侏儒类法术能力之外，你还获得下列类法术能力：每天1次－‘法师之手（mage hand）’以及‘魔法伎俩（prestidigitation）’。
mythicText_zh: 感谢你的神话之力吧，你的血统中的魔法之力正在翻涌奔腾。
mythicBenefit_zh:
你获得后述类法术能力：1次/日—朦胧术（blur）以及渐隐术（vanish）

每日你能够使用侏儒类法术能力的次数提升，额外增加的次数等同于你的阶层的一半。你能够这些额外使用次数用于施放任何你所具有的侏儒类法术能力。你的侏儒类法术能力的施法者等级变为你的角色等级加上你的阶层。
